website_summaries.verdict: Trendy bag that can take all your gear and double up as a purse at the same time.
pros: A lightweight, roomy bag that stands upright on its own without tipping over and spilling contents everywhere
Attractive lining, and the exterior can be wiped clean
A good depth allows it to hold a lot
Not cumbersome and is easy to carry
cons: More interior pockets or a divider would have been useful

customer_reviews.title: Great tennis bag
customer_reviews.text: The teal is a beautiful color and the bag is a lot roomier than my previous tennis backpack. It has great storage options. I would definitely recommend. Note: a friend has the black and it looks much nicer in person. :)
customer_reviews.author: Fishy La Rue

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Roomy
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous color, spacious bag! Two racquets fit easily into the outside pocket plenty of room inside for tennis accesories. Outside pockets useful for putting items you reach for frequently. Love it! If it zipped close at the top it would be even better!
customer_reviews.author: StorageLady

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: My tennis racquet fits nicely and comfortably in this bag. It is designed well and looks great. The water bottle fits into one outside pocket and a can of balls on the other side.
customer_reviews.author: RoadRunnerBpBp

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tennis Bag
customer_reviews.text: I adore this bag! Plenty of deep pockets, holds two rackets, holds my YETI cup. Cleans up easily. Easy to carry. Highly recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag is perfect for Tennis
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag is perfect for Tennis. The only reason I gave it four stars is because I'm not in love with the zebra print in the inside but you can't see it and it's a wonderful tote bag.
customer_reviews.author: pamela s.huus

customer_reviews.title: Maggie Mather tennis bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this tennis bag! It's a beautiful color, the perfect size (not too bulky), smartly design with plenty of pockets. I'm very happy I purchased this bag!
customer_reviews.author: HBK

customer_reviews.title: Great tennis bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tennis bag. I wish it were still available in hot pink!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tennis bag! Very functional. A lot of compartments. Holds everything. Stylist! Receiving a great many compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag!! I ordered this for a friend b/c they are all the rage at my tennis club. The colors are so vibrant! It stands upright, has plenty of room for two racquets and enough pockets to organize but not so many that you can't find anything. I've had one for over a year and finally washed it ..... It came out beautiful! Really like the contrasting interior linings, too.
customer_reviews.author: Connie F

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tennis bag. Holds a lot of things, and has many pockets to keep me organized.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tennis Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great tennis bag. Lots of pockets for storage. Only thing that would make it better is an ability to zip the main pocket closed.
customer_reviews.author: abeermom

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Been using this teal tennis tote bag for over a year. I really like it. It is not bulky but everything fits in it.
customer_reviews.author: carolee harkins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product - very durable and lots of space for everything.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wimble

customer_reviews.title: A great bag. Use it for tennis and for travelling
customer_reviews.text: A great bag. Use it for tennis and for travelling!!!
customer_reviews.author: jessica g leavitt

customer_reviews.title: The bag is awesome except I ordered the Teal color and got plum/purple
customer_reviews.text: The bag is awesome except I ordered the Teal color and got plum/purple. I was so disappointed when I opened the package and saw the wrong colr.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mastrolia
